name: Beneath a Steel Sky
description:
This script will install "Beneath a Steel Sky" extra download from  ScummVM for ScummVM.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Free BASS CD archive from https://www.scummvm.org/games/#sky
- Multilanguage: you could choose your preferred game language during install between english (default), french, german, spanish and italian.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Beneath a Steel Sky - ScummVM extra - ScummVM

content:
custom-name: Beneath a Steel Sky - ScummVM extra - ScummVM
files:
- bassfiles: https://www.scummvm.org/frs/extras/Beneath%20a%20Steel%20Sky/bass-cd-1.2.zip
game:
  args: --language=$INPUT_LANG
  game_id: sky
  path: $GAMEDIR/
  subtitles: true
installer:
- extract:
    args: $GAMEDIR
    file: bassfiles
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose your preferred game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - de: German
    - es: Spanish
    - it: Italian
    preselect: en
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
